MongoDB -- NYC | Software Engineer, Testing Infrastructure & Developer Productivity | Full-Time | Base + RSU's We're hiring a Software Engineer that enjoys solving complex problems and making other engineers more productive.

This team works adjacent to a large C++ system, and solves problems in Distributed Systems and Databases by developing open-source tools (sometimes using Machine Learning) and infrastructure in Python/JavaScript to enable engineering teams within MongoDB to do their job more efficiently and effectively.

Any interest? Please reach out to me directly at Matt.Leva@MongoDB.com, or apply at https://grnh.se/h11tbkxd1.
